body: Its weird how it doesnt say years later or decades later lol
Uhm, which number chapter is this ? I am confused, isn't this the end chapter 12 ?

@indominusrex They were having a discussion about how the boy had been treated by the 3 of them. 2 of the girls treated him well, but one of them (the short-haired one) would treat him more like a toy than anything and simply thought that because she gave her first to him, then he belongs to her and only her. The other 2 retaliate by saying that they've given their first to him too, so she has no right to try and keep him all to herself. So they're punishing her selfishness here.
also, this need the yuri tag for that play between those 2 sisters. No 3some or 4some, yuri, they were fucking alone without the boy being involved.

@indominusrex imo the brother had children with one of the sisters if not all 3, those children grew up, married someone and had children too... then in the last part we see those grandchildren speaking about their gramps and also following the "tradition" that those gave birth to.
Love it.. but the ending didn't really made sense to me..
It's Finally Complete!!!! After All This Time!!!
